name: Hunter Beast
cooked:
Honestly I’d be open to renaming it to Pay to Tap Script Hash, or P2TSH. It rhymes better with P2WSH that way.

I’ll admit I’ve done worse things just to get an ACK on my BIP

Should I go ahead and make the PR?
topic_title: Changes to BIP-360 - Pay to Quantum Resistant Hash (P2QRH)
